$(bold)Summoning$()$(br2)To summon the ancient blaze you need to place a$(br)Jack o'Lantern on top of two glowstone blocks.$(br2)Once the ancient blaze is summoned it will be invulnerable until it charged up it's 6 large fireballs.$(br2)The amount of large fireballs can be seen by the amount of sticks flying around.
$(bold)Death$()$(br2)When dying, it will drop it's helmet.$(br2)The ancient blaze will spawn 4 normal blazes to revenge it's death.
